item.title: Trying a New Editor
item.description: Status Quo Vim was the first editor (excluding IDEs) I ever used about 10 years ago. I’ve tried many editors since but I’ve stuck with the Vim family and currently settled on Neovim. The Neovim ecosystem has evolved nicely over time with plugins treating it as a first class citizen. I’ve tried to use graphical editors such as VScode with much success. It almost took over as my daily editor. But I keep drifting back to Vim.
